value.title: Despite proficiency in machine learning and math, India trails in data skills: Report

value.title: Element adds AWS integration for industrial sensor data
value.excerpt: Element is launching an API integration between its Element Unify software and AWS IoT SiteWise to contextualize industrial sensor data.

value.title: AI-powered transcription startup Verbit raises $157M
value.excerpt: Verbit, a startup offering AI-powered transcription services, has raised $157 million in venture capital at an over $1 billion valuation.

value.title: IIT Mandi Offers Online Course on Deep Learning for Working Professionals

value.title: How WorkTango Solves The Annual Employee Engagement Survey Facade
value.excerpt: WorkTango disrupts the employee engagement landscape, enabling companies to give their employees a voice and collect authentic feedback for any purpose at any time.

value.title: Mythic launches power-sipping AI chip
value.excerpt: Semiconductor startup Mythic has launched an artificial intelligence (AI) processor that it says will deliver the computing capabilities of a GPU for a tenth of the power. The M1076 Mythic AMP chip targets edge computing AI applications with power and footprint limitations.

value.title: Artificial intelligence enhances efficacy of sleep disorder treatments

value.title: Six Of The Smartest Applications Of Artificial Intelligence In Business
value.excerpt: Businesses that want to figure out how to best leverage artificial intelligence can experiment with unique ways of using it. Through trial and error, a company can track its results with AI initiatives and find out what works best for its specific needs.

value.title: ISEE brings autonomy to shipping yards with self-driving container trucks

value.title: Who Won The Latest AI Drag Race? AWS Or NVIDIA?
value.excerpt: There is a quiet drama simmering over AI chip benchmarks. This isn’t the first time, and will certainly not be the last. Keeps me busy. This time, it is between Amazon Web Services (AWS) and NVIDIA. It is always NVIDIA.

value.title: Foundations of trustworthy AI: How mature is your AI governance?
value.excerpt: As organizations scale their use of AI, they increasingly need to do so in a responsible and governed manner. value.title: Can AI and cloud automation slash a cloud bill in half?
value.excerpt: Many companies don’t realize how dramatically their cloud spend can increase given that those expenses aren’t charged up-front.

value.title: Croatia’s Gideon Brothers raises $31M for its 3D vision-enabled autonomous warehouse robots

value.title: Why is Artificial Intelligence the fastest growing industry?
value.excerpt: In recent years, Artificial Intelligence has become the industry with the highest growth in the world and, consequently, it has transformed our way of living, producing and relating.

value.title: Snowflake previews data marketplace, governance tools, management features
value.excerpt: Snowflake today previewed a slew of capabilities for its cloud platform to address data monetization, governance, and performance.

value.title: Compose.ai raises $2.1M to help everyone write faster
value.excerpt: Compose.ai, which built its own language model to help folks write faster, landed a $2.1 million seed round led by Craft Ventures.

value.title: Using AI To Block Unconscious Bias, Widen The Talent Pool And Increase Diversity
value.excerpt: DEI is the top talent management priority for CEOs. As more organizations prioritize diversity, the challenge is figuring out how to achieve it. For starters, how can we block unconscious bias in the hiring process?

value.title: Apple M1 chip makes Adobe apps 80% faster, and some gains are bigger still
value.excerpt: Apple is rolling out its new M1 processor across its hardware range. It’s designed for better performance and lower power consumption, and uses unified memory and a Neural Engine for AI-driven tasks.

value.title: IBM releases AI model toolkit to help developers measure uncertainty
value.excerpt: IBM has released a toolkit designed to help developers measure uncertainty in an AI and machine learning model.

value.title: Study shows AI-generated fake reports even fool experts
value.excerpt: If you use such social media websites as Facebook and Twitter, you may have come across posts flagged with warnings about misinformation. So far, most misinformation—flagged and unflagged—has been aimed at the general public.

value.title: Indian Startup Innovates Supply Chains For Dynamic IoT-Based Intelligence
value.excerpt: Intelligent technologies like IoT, machine learning, and AI are transforming supply chain logistics and quality assurance for groundbreaking innovations.

value.title: Government and business can develop an ethical AI future together, KPMG study finds
value.excerpt: Industry leaders believe the Biden administration will help advance AI adoption, and also believe it has an essential role in regulating AI.

value.title: Qualcomm adds 7 new chips to power IoT installations in retail, warehouse and manufacturing sectors
value.excerpt: The chips range from high-end to entry-level in cost and can support a variety of IoT use cases from AI to edge computing.

value.title: How Utilities Can Use Data And AI To Turn Every Interaction Into A Marketing Opportunity
value.excerpt: Utilities often collect an enormous amount of customer data that can be extremely valuable for segmenting, targeting and engaging with different audiences. The next step is to use this data to enhance marketing automation and break down the silos between departments.
